select hm.*, h.name as hospital_name, ms.material_spec as material_spec from hospital_material hm inner join hospital h on hm.hospital_id = h.id inner join material_spec ms on hm.material_spec_id = ms.id inner join material m on ms.material_id = m.id
and h.name like concat( '%', #{request.hospitalName}, '%')
and ms.material_spec like concat( '%', #{request.materialSpec}, '%')
and hm.hospital_id = #{request.hospitalId}
and ms.price like concat( '%', #{request.price}, '%')
and hm.inactive = #{request.inactive}
order by hm.gmt_modified desc
